wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.chat.death: {actorName} has reached the death threshold (TB {tb}) and may die
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.chat.deathAvoid: The death of {actorName} has been completely avoided. The GM must handle this manually, or it may occur again if the character later goes from 1 Wound to Unconscious, as per the rules.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.chat.deathCrit: {actorName} has suffered too many Critical Wounds ({critCount} > TB {tb}). End of Round: they could die.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.chat.deathCritA: {actorName} has suffered too many Critical Wounds ({critCount} > TB {tb}). End of Round: dies.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.chat.deathCritW: {actorName} has suffered too many Critical Wounds ({critCount} > TB {tb}) and could die at the end of the round.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.chat.deathWaitN: or wait until the next round.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.chat.message: {actorName} has been reduced to 0 Wounds. Falls
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.chat.prone: {actorName} is at 0 Wounds and may gain
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.chat.unconsciou: {actorName} has remained at 0 Wounds for too long (TB {tb}) and now falls
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.chat.wake: {actorName} is no longer at 0 Wounds and may remove
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.description: Handles Prone, Unconscious, Wake Up, and Death effects for PCs and NPCs when Wounds drop to 0. Supports automatic modes, chat prompts, and GM-controlled outcomes.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.enable: Enable or disable all features of this module.
Apply these rules to NPCs and creatures.
Apply these rules to all player characters.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.npcCri: Send a warning when an NPC becomes Unconscious at 0 Wounds and has more Critical Wounds than their Toughness Bonus.
NPC: Warn on Unconscious when Criticals > TB
Who receives the warning when an NPC becomes Unconscious with Criticals > TB.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.npcDea: Send a notification to the GM when Death is applied automatically to NPCs.
How to handle death for NPCs when the death threshold is reached. GM only.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.npcPro: Send chat notification when Prone is applied automatically.
How to handle Prone when an NPC reaches 0 Wounds.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.npcRec: Who receives messages for NPCs and creatures.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.npcUnc: Send chat notification when Unconscious is applied automatically.
How to handle Unconscious after TB rounds at 0 Wounds.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.npcWak: Send chat notification when Unconscious is removed automatically.
How to handle removal of Unconscious when an NPC has more than 0 Wounds.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.pcCrit: Send a warning when a PC becomes Unconscious at 0 Wounds and has more Critical Wounds than their Toughness Bonus.
PC: Warn on Unconscious when Criticals > TB
Who receives the warning when a PC becomes Unconscious with Criticals > TB.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.pcDeat: Allows the GM to spend 1 Fate Point to prevent death: removes all Bleeding conditions and pauses death, leaving the character unconscious but stable.
Send a notification to the GM when Death is applied automatically.
How to handle death when the death threshold is reached. GM only.
When the GM applies Death or uses «Death May Wait», post an informational message to everyone.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.pcPron: Send chat notification when Prone is applied automatically.
How to handle Prone when a PC is reduced to 0 Wounds.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.pcReci: Who receives messages for PCs reaching 0 Wounds.
Who receives messages when PCs wake from Unconscious.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.pcUnco: Send chat notification when Unconscious is applied automatically.
How to handle Unconscious after staying at 0 Wounds for TB rounds.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.settings.pcWake: Send chat notification when Unconscious is removed automatically.
How to handle removal of Unconscious when a PC has more than 0 Wounds.
wfrp4e-zero-wounds-prone.title: WFRP4e - Zero Wounds
